review: Ordered it to use with a Slingbox M.  Utilizing the Amazon App it works as expected on my home network.  I have Apple TV too, but this is much easier to utilize and smaller.  I was able to power the Fire Stick from a USB port on the TV so there is no need to run the AC power supply that came with the device.
author: MB

review: Stops and starts even when the signal is very good.  Freezes, have to turn off tv, wait a while, then turn back on.  Frustrating!

review: Works good.  I just wish the remove was better and had keys.

review: This item is great for the cost and programing available.  I would like to see better perks for Prime customers.

review: Works very well once connected to wifi (which wasn't a problem at all; just follow the instructions). The quality of the picture is amazingly clear and sharp. I've got a blu-ray player that also runs Amazon Prime & Netflix, but is glitchy and has to reload occasionally - not so with the Fire TV Stick. Only a one time issue, it didn't wake from its sleep, so I had to disconnect it from power source and TV, but once plugged back in everything was back to normal, and and I haven't had the issue again. I have now had it for over a month.
author: Frank H

review: Easier way to stream television shows and movies.

review: I could never get good reception to the stick. I had to go back to Airplaying from my iPad to my Apple TV. I had high hopes, though. Nice design.

review: I'm very pleased with this product which was easy to install.  At first, I didn't switch the HDMI so it didn't work.  After changing that, it was good.
